mapper.sql: select ANNOUNCEMENT_INFO_ID, PLAN_ID, UNITS_ID, APPROVER_ID, APPROVER_NAME, APPROVAL_FLAG, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, ENT_ID from inspection_announcement_info
mapper.select: select u.ORG_NAME, u.UNITS_ID, doc.PIIS_DOC_ID, doc.OBJECT_ID, doc.FILE_DICT_ID, doc.FILE_NAME, doc.FILE_SIZE, doc.FILE_PATH from inspection_units u left join inspection_plan p on p.PLAN_ID = u.PLAN_ID left join inspection_announcement_info i on i.UNITS_ID = u.UNITS_ID left join piis_document doc on concat('AnnouncementInfo', i.ANNOUNCEMENT_INFO_ID) = doc.OBJECT_ID where u.PLAN_ID = #{planId}

select ANNOUNCEMENT_INFO_ID, PLAN_ID, UNITS_ID, APPROVER_ID, APPROVER_NAME, APPROVAL_FLAG, i.CREATED_BY as 'c.CREATED_BY', i.CREATED_TIME as 'c.CREATED_TIME', i.UPDATED_BY as 'c.UPDATED_BY', i.UPDATED_TIME as 'c.UPDATED_TIME', i.ENT_ID as 'c.ENT_ID', doc.PIIS_DOC_ID, doc.OBJECT_ID, doc.FILE_DICT_ID, doc.FILE_NAME, doc.FILE_SIZE, doc.FILE_PATH from inspection_announcement_info i left join piis_document doc on concat('AnnouncementInfo', i.ANNOUNCEMENT_INFO_ID) = doc.OBJECT_ID where i.ANNOUNCEMENT_INFO_ID = #{announcementInfoId}
